why_us.title: Why Nuklias?
why_us.subtitle: Why choose Nuklias as your digital growth partner?

1.title: Client-First Mentality
1.desc: We think like business owners, not just service providers. Every dollar invested must yield a return

2.title: Full-Service Architecture
2.desc: From code to content, we handle every layer of your digital ecosystem in-house, ensuring total cohesion

3.title: Proactive Evolution
3.desc: We don't just react to trends; we anticipate them. Your system is always ready for tomorrow's market

4.title: Radical Transparency
4.desc: No black-box magic. You have full visibility into our strategies, metrics, and the logic behind every move

5.title: Proven Impact
5.desc: We measure success in revenue, not vanity metrics. Our systems effectively scale businesses and saturate capacities

6.title: Relentless Passion
6.desc: We are digital architects who love the craft. We build with precision, speed, and an obsession for quality

what_we_solve.title: The only marketing that matters: The money in your pocket
what_we_solve.desc: The only marketing that matters is the one you can observe in your pockets at the end of the month. We do not sell 'visibility' or 'likes'; we build the structural machinery that turns digital chaos into liquid cash with total predictability

1.title: Operational Agility
1.desc: While others get lost in the planning phase, we focus on immediate, high-impact implementation. We drive your projects forward with a level of intensity and precision that ensures you stay ahead of the market and see results faster

2.title: Integrated Growth Ecosystems
2.desc: Stop investing in disconnected digital fragments. We architect unified ecosystems where SEO, Content, and Strategy function as a single, cohesive architecture designed to attract, engage, and convert your ideal leads 24/7

3.title: Revenue-First Engineering
3.desc: We prioritize the metrics that directly impact your wallet and spending habits: We focus on the stability of your lead flow and amplify your profit, simple as that

contact_us.title: Let's Build Something Great Together
contact_us.desc: Ready to transform your digital presence? Get in touch and let's discuss how we can help you achieve your goals
contact_us.response_time: We typically respond within 24 hours. For urgent matters, please call us directly

process_page.title: The Next Steps
process_page.desc: A clear and transparent process designed to build your digital success, step by step — from the first conversation to measurable results

1.title: Contact Us
1.desc: Everything starts with an open, no-obligation conversation, where we make sure we’re the perfect fit for your goals

2.title: Schedule a Consultation
2.desc: We analyze the core of your business and create a strategic roadmap with clear steps and a 100% transparent offer

3.title: Choose a Package
3.desc: Together, we select the right package, and our partnership becomes official. From here on, we work as an extension of your team

4.title: Become Our Partner
4.desc: We set the growth engine in motion and start building your visible and measurable success

process_page.info_desc_1: Every step is carefully planned to ensure the best possible results. We don’t promise miracles — we promise a clear, measurable, and results-driven process
process_page.info_desc_2: From the initial conversation to a long-term partnership, we work as an extension of your team, always focused on your success

what_we_solve_page.content_desc: We transform your digital presence into a revenue-generating machine. Our approach is systematic, measurable, and focused on one thing: growing your business
what_we_solve_page.approach_p1: At Nuklias, we don't believe in one-size-fits-all solutions. Every business is unique, and your digital strategy should reflect that. We start by understanding your specific challenges, goals, and market position
what_we_solve_page.approach_p2: Our team combines deep technical expertise with strategic business thinking. We build systems that work not just today, but evolve with your business. From initial analysis to ongoing optimization, we're with you every step of the way
what_we_solve_page.approach_p3: We measure success in real results: increased revenue, qualified leads, and sustainable growth. No vanity metrics. No empty promises. Just proven systems that deliver measurable outcomes for your business

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Nuklias Digital Architects ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services. By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, as well as data collected automatically when you use our services

list.personal: Personal Data: Name, email address, phone number, billing address, and other contact information you voluntarily provide via forms or contracts
list.usage: Usage Data: Information about how you access and use our website, including IP address, browser type, operating system, and pages visited
list.cookies: Tracking Technologies: We use cookies, beacons, and scripts to track activity and store certain information

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the collected data for various purposes:
list: To provide and maintain our Service
To notify you about changes to our Service
To allow you to participate in interactive features when you choose to do so
To gather analysis or valuable information so that we can improve our Service
To monitor the usage of our Service
To detect, prevent and address technical issues
To provide you with news, special offers and general information about other goods, services and events which we offer

retention.title: 4. Data Retention
retention.content: We will retain your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies

transfer.title: 5. Transfer of Data
transfer.content: Your information, including Personal Data, may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from your jurisdiction. We will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy

rights.title: 6. Your Data Protection Rights (GDPR)
rights.content: If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain data protection rights:

list.access: Right to Access: You can request copies of your personal data
list.rectification: Right to Rectification: You can request correction of inaccurate data
list.erasure: Right to Erasure: You can request deletion of your personal data ('Right to be Forgotten')
list.restrict: Right to Restrict Processing: You can request restriction of processing your data
list.portability: Right to Data Portability: You can request transfer of your data to another organization
list.object: Right to Object: You can object to our processing of your data

security.title: 7. Security of Data
security.content: The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us via our website contact form or directly via email

intro.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
intro.content: By accessing and using the Nuklias Digital Architects website and services, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services

services.title: 2. Services Description
services.content: Nuklias Digital Architects provides digital marketing, website development, SEO, and related digital services ('Services'). We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any service at any time without notice

responsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: By using our Services, you agree to:
list: Provide accurate and complete information when required
Use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms
Not interfere with or disrupt the security or performance of our services
Respect all intellectual property rights and confidentiality agreements
Not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of our services or systems

intellectual_property.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.content: All content, features, and functionality (including but not limited to software, text, displays, images, video, and audio, and the design, selection, and arrangement thereof) are owned by Nuklias Digital Architects, its licensors, or other providers of such material and are protected by copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property or proprietary rights laws

payment.title: 5. Payment & Billing
payment.content: Payment terms will be specified in individual service agreements or invoices. All fees are due as agreed upon. Unpaid invoices may result in the suspension of services. Prices are subject to change with prior notice

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Nuklias Digital Architects shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from (i) your access to or use of or inability to access or use the Service; (ii) any conduct or content of any third party on the Service; (iii) any content obtained from the Service; and (iv) unauthorized access, use or alteration of your transmissions or content

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your access to our services immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease

governing.title: 8. Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Romania and the European Union, without regard to its conflict of law provisions

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. By continuing to access or use our Service after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms

glossary.title: Dashboard Metrics Guide
glossary.new_leads: Potential clients who have entered your pipeline recently.
glossary.active_tasks: Tasks currently in progress or waiting to be done.
glossary.conversion_rate: Percentage of leads that turned into paying customers.
glossary.team_activity: Number of active team members working this month.
